Torture that led to eventual strangulation by a rope orelectrical cord
Knives, Coils of rope, rolls of tape, rubber gloves, cloths,a Variac metallurgy tool that the killers used to giveelectric shocks to the genitals and other sensitive parts.
Yes; Bunting was the leader of three other men.

Robert Wagner ‘Papa Smurf’, James Vlassakis, and MarkHaydon were the three main group members. However,Elizabeth Harvey, Thomas Trevilyan, and Barry Lane,each assisted in one of the murdered victims.
The main group consisted of three males. Robert Wagnerwas a homosexual, while James Vlassakis and MarkHaydon were heterosexuals.

•James Vlassakis was a step-son.•Robert Wagner started out as a neighbor andbecome a best friend of Bunting’s.•Mark Haydon and John met in a welding courseand became good friends. John Bunting endedup dating Haydon’s sister and later on Haydon’swife’s sister.

column1: Killing occurred in home of victim?
column2: •Suzanne Allen was claimed to be killed in herbathroom and was mutilated. Her body wasburied in Buntings backyard.•Troy Youde was dragged out of his own bed byBunting and his accomplices. At the time Youdewas living at the 203 Waterloo Corner Rdhouse. He was tortured and strangled in thedownstairs bathroom.•Michael Gardinear was killed by strangulationof a rope and burns were found on his scrotum.

column1: Killing occurred in home of killer?
column2: •Clinton Trezise was killed in Bunting’s home inthe living room by being bashed in the headwith a hammer.

We also searched for books in the library about John Bunting but there were none. We alsosearched some search engines on the web and most articles that came up were just about the hearings.  All ofthe above did not have sufficient or any information about John Bunting.**N/A= No information was able to be found.Areas where we had trouble finding information on John Bunting:1.Some of his childhood and family relations i.e. Parent’s occupation.2.We could not find anything on Bunting psychological information, there was nothing mentionedabout previous crimes, but we don’t know if there just was not any information about it.3.Location of killings were not found for Barry Lane and Garry O’Dwyer,4.We were not able to find the dates of the murders of Gavin Porter, Gary O’Dwyer.
